page.title: 05PARK FARM DAIRY:MRS.WILKINS
page.content: She has lived there for 62 years,and has lived in the area all her life as generations of her family had done before her.She runs the farm by herself which has 60 cows producing 300 litres of milk daily,35 of which are calves.Her only form of transport is a Mini Metro car as no public transport passes through the area.She lives alone with her pet dog as her only son and daughter have left home.The techniques of farming have improved over the years eg.milking machinery and production of silage. Mrs.Wilkins has never been abroad and only had one holiday 28 years ago.A Roman Villa had been found a couple of fields away from her.The real locals, like herself ,are still left in the area .She said she would like to stay in the area for ever!
